_comments.all: This file controls the display settings for product cards across the application.
_comments.currency_symbol: Sets the currency symbol used for prices (e.g., '$', '€', '£').
_comments.display: Contains boolean flags to toggle the visibility of different sections on the product cards.
_comments.display.show_rating_on_card: If true, the star rating will be shown on the product card.
_comments.display.show_review_count_on_card: If true, the total number of reviews will be shown next to the star rating.
_comments.display.show_description_on_card: If true, the product's short description will be displayed.
_comments.display.show_reviews_on_card: If true, a section with individual customer reviews will be shown at the bottom of the card.
_comments.badge: Controls the styling for badges that appear on the product card image.
_comments.badge.discount_variant: Defines the color variant for the discount percentage badge. Options: 'default', 'secondary', 'destructive', 'outline'.
_comments.badge.promo_type_classes: A string of Tailwind CSS classes to style the 'Promo Type' badge (e.g., 'BOGO', 'Freebie'). This allows for more custom styling.

badge.promo_type_classes: relative inline-flex items-center rounded-full border border-transparent bg-accent px-2.5 py-0.5 text-xs font-semibold text-accent-foreground shadow
